description:
It's generally not done for men to dance in public in Iraq. In fact, it can get you into a lot of trouble. But that hasn't stopped a talented young dancer who performs under the name Adel Euro. He's been teaching himself with the help of online videos and has been having lessons over video link with a dance company in New York. And this year, he got a chance to perform on stage for the first time in Jordan. Adel told me how he discovered dance.

The inspiration for dancing started when I was a kid and I watched a CD of a performance between Michael Jackson and Britney Spears, and since then I started loving dancing and I thought to be a dancer one day. 

Who was the better dancer, Michael Jackson or Britney Spears?

Michael Jackson, I think.

So did you decide: Ok, I would be Michael Jackson, at that point?

I felt like I was born then and it had a big impact on myself. When I watched Michael Jackson dancing, I liked the ways he moves and then moves on the stage. So at the beginning I brought many CDs of Michael Jackson's performance and started doing what he did in these CDs. And now I can do almost every move he does.

Even the moonwalk. 

声明：音视频均来自互联网链接，仅供学习使用。本网站自身不存储、控制、修改被链接的内容。“沪江英语”高度重视知识产权保护。当如发现本网站发布的信息包含有侵犯其著作权的链接内容时，请联系我们，我们将依法采取措施移除相关内容或屏蔽相关链接。>>零基础直达流利生活口语班<<

title: 舞者（有声）

description:
《英乐天天唱》是一档模仿唱歌类节目，目的在于提升大家的英语口语能力。主持人会在每期节目中选取好听的歌曲片段，并给出发音提示和模仿示例。喜欢听音乐的童鞋可要积极参与哦！去沪江部落订阅本节目！

贾斯汀·比伯（英语：Justin Bieber，1994年3月1日－），加拿大歌手。早期因为在YouTube翻唱其他人的歌曲而出名，为亚瑟小子所赏识，与小岛唱片签约，居住在美国洛杉矶，并于2009年11月17日发行他的第一张专辑《MY WORLDS》的第一部分《MY WORLD》。 截止发行后第五周，该唱片已在美国售出百万张，并在加拿大被认证为白金唱片。专辑的第二部分《MY WORLD 2.0》，于2010年3月发行，亦获得不错的商业成绩。2011年冬季，小贾斯汀发行了他的圣诞特辑《Under the Mistletoe》（爱在圣诞）。2012年春季发行第二张录音室专辑《BELIEVE》，标志着小贾斯汀的转型。而近些年来，伴随着转型，小贾斯汀的负面新闻也逐渐增多，在YouTube上的《Baby》音乐录像带页面甚至出现差评多于好评的情形。小贾斯汀身体有多处刺青，左边小腿有刺青“Jesus”。
《Boyfriend》是人气小天王Justin Bieber完整意义上第2张录音室专辑《Believe》的首波主打单曲，也是JustinBieber歌手生涯中重要的转型之作。人气小天王贾斯汀·比伯（Justin Bieber）热门单曲《Boyfriend》MV完整版曝光。已过成人礼的比伯逐渐告别往日的正太形象，大走性感与成熟路线，与女主角大跳贴身热舞。而MV中“太空漫步”则是向自己偶像迈克尔·杰克逊的公开致敬。

If I was your boyfriend, I’d never let you go
如果我是你的男朋友，我绝对不会让你走
I can take you places you ain’t never been before
我会带你去那些你未曾去过的地方
Baby take a chance or you’ll never ever know
亲爱的如果不试一试你永远都不会知道
I got money in my hands that I’d really like to blow (Swag swag swag) on you
我手上的财富愿为你肆意挥霍
Chillin by the fire why we eatin’ fondue
为什么在在寒冷中，我们可以烤着篝火吃着火锅boyfriend(13张)
I dunno about me but I know about you
因为我虽然不懂自己但却十分了解你
So say hello to falsetto in three two
而现在来用假声 三，二
（紫色模唱部分）
I’d like to be everything you want
我愿意变成你想要的一切
Hey girl, let me talk to you
嘿女孩，让我对你说
If I was your boyfriend, never let you go
如果我是你的男朋友，我绝对不会让你走
Keep you on my arm girl, you’d never be alone
把你环在我的臂弯，你永远都不会再孤单
I can be a gentleman, anything you want
我能成为你的绅士，你想要的一切
If I was your boyfriend, I’d never let you go, I’d never let you go
如果我是你的男朋友，我绝对不会让你走，绝对不会让你走

讲解：

title: 英文歌曲天天唱：Boyfriend

description:
《英文天天写》是沪江社团一档写作类社刊，其目的在于提升大家的英语写作能力。每期节目主持人都会给出一个话题，积极参加的童鞋还会得到主持人的专业点评哦！想提高英语写作的童鞋千万不要错过哦！去沪江社团订阅本社刊！

          

话题：

Writing: imagine a scenario or express your opinion
Tie up
To tie up means to be caught in a situation where movement is difficult. What or who is tied up? How did it happen? What is the solution?
This week's topic: They were tied up... (90-110 words)

Suggestions:
1) tied up in a meeting
2) tied up by commitments
3) tied up in a relationship
4) tied up till the end of the week
5) Instead of writing a scenario, feel free to comment on the story below.

范例1：

The first person who came to mind was Wolfe. All morning, the intern had been walking by Wolfe's desk quite a few times, checking up on him to see if he was free. Yet, the busy reporter seemed to tied up. With his head buried in his work though, Wolfe did not notice the wandering intern. Knowing he had to gain the favor of Wolfe, the intern decided to get lunch for him. And perhaps, this approach was working as he felt Wolfe was quite approachable with a full stomach.

想要得到专业主持人的点评和意见吗？快来节目现场一试身手吧>>
